name: Frozen Ice Cream Slushie Maker
description:
Your own slushy Frozen Ice cream Slushie store is here!
Create cool ice cream shapes in rainbow colors!

~~~IT'S TIME TO MAKE RAINBOW SLUSHY~~~

Download ** Frozen Ice Cream Slushie Maker ** to run your own ice cream bar! Love ice cool games? Let's make a tasty dessert in the form of mouthwatering drinks. Mix different flavors to make colors slushy unique!

We have the largest collection of funny stickers! Being a bar manager to load your machine to make cool ice shapes! brace yourself in the world of dessert making games. Use fresh fruits, add cool flavors with the ice cubes and blend until the frozen ice cream slushie is ready! But it's not over, you can do much more in your dessert shop - have a look some of the cool features of this game:

Cool Product Features:
* A different variety of cool ingredients to combine!
* Make a super yummy slushy corner!
* Realistic frozen slushy making includes cups, blending, flavors and straws
* Tons of decorations to try - fruits, ice, water, sweet candies, sprinkles - Everything is here!
* Cool flavor mixes with rainbow color and fruit mixes
* Cooking tools to play like a slushy machine, slushy cups, freezer, ice cube, knife, cutting board and much more
* Make a super slushy cold drink whenever you want!

How to play:
- Pick out a cup of drink and add an ice cube
- Try different flavors to make slushy
- Mix the ingredients to create the unique flavor of dessert, ice cream, and slushies
- Decorate with your style with sweet toppings for the perfect slushy treat

Looking for a carnival drink game with the combination of mix slushy? well, stop looking because our "Frozen Ice Cream Slushie Maker" is here! Join the ultimate frozen season to create a rainbow slushy. You are super maker - refreshing your mood to prepare ice cream, cotton candy, snow cone and ice cold slushies! Let's Play and install it now.

Leave a review and let us know what you think about this fun game. We will use the feedback In our upcoming updates!

If you have any queries feel free to ask! Thanks for playing
